author: hwright
msg: Don't modify the log accumulator when we find a tree conflict.  Instead, use
the returned tree conflict to fill in the log accumulator in the caller.
(check_tree_conflict): Remove the log_accum parameter, and always set
Loggily add the tree conflict if we detected one.
